basics.name: Rajesh D. Mangannavar
basics.label: Artifical Intelligence Researcher
basics.summary: To leverage my expertise in sequential decision-making, planning, reinforcement learning, and graph neural networks to develop intelligent agents with common sense behavior, contributing to the advancement of artificial intelligence and its real-world applications

work.name: Oregon State University
work.summary: Research in AI, focusing on intelligent agents and machine learning
highlights: Developed an agent for object retrieval in AI2Thor with 91% success rate over 5000 scenes
Implemented hierarchical POMDP techniques for environment mapping
Developed GNN-based planning model with 5x speedups in 4/8 domains
Led core algorithm development while mentoring 5 team members

highlights: TA for CS271 (Computer Architecture and Assembly Language)
Assisted in grading, conducting tests, and held office hours

work.name: CISCO
work.summary: Worked on IOS XR security and NLP applications
highlights: Improved router security through secure workflow implementation
Developed NLP solutions for command line interface
Implemented reinforcement learning for continuous model improvement
